All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionSyntaxInvalidException
    this class throws an exception when the lines syntax is invalid
    Block
    describe a scope in Sjavac: section of code that could be described as all the global members, or specific method, or inner scope such as if or while section.
    CloserHandler
    handle the case of encounter } sign.
    ExecuteLine
    managing the action the have been just read from the Sjavac code.
    ExtractArguments
    this is an abstract class, its purpose is to create new objects of type LineType
    FindLineType
    this enum finds and creates the type of the specific line being checked
    Functions
    describe method block, hold all list of all the lines refer to it, can add variable that declared as argument in the signature to new Variable objects, and contains a list of the their types by order.
    IfAndWhileHandler
    handle the situation when encounter if or while statements.
    IfAndWilException
    this class throws an exception when the syntax of if or while are invalid
    IfOrWhileParser
    this is class inherits from ExtractArguments its purpose is to create new objects of type LineType according to if and while lines
    InvalidActionTermsException
    this class throws an exception when the content of the action is invalid
    InvalidArgsInMain
    this class throws an exception when the user sends invalid amount of arguments to the program
    InvalidCastingException
    exception called when a variable casted in an invalid way
    InvalidDeclarationException
    exception called when a variable declaration is invalid
    InvalidLineLocationException
    this class throws an exception when there is an action being called to be done in an invalid location
    InvalidMethodSignatureException
    this class throws an exception when the signature is invalid
    InvalidVariableNameException
    exception called the variable name is invalid
    LineType
    this class created the object maintaining all the information needed
    MethodHandler
    handle the situation when encounter method signature or method call.
    MethodInvokeParser
    this is class inherits from ExtractArguments its purpose is to create new objects of type LineType according creating new method
    MethodSignatureParser
    this is class inherits from ExtractArguments its purpose is to create new objects of type LineType according to calling a function
    Parsers
    this class gathers all the relevant information each line has, saves it in an object for future usage
    ReadFile
    attempt to read the Sjavac file.
    ScopeNotClosedException
    this class throws an exception when the scope is not closed properly
    Sjavac
    this is the oop.ex6.main class, runs the whole program making sure that the file given to us by the user are valid
    tester  
    Types
    define the types in Sjavac.
    Variable
    define variable in this project
    VariableException
    exception called when a variable is not valid
    VariableFactory
    create variable object from given line and add it to the block map directly.
    VariableHandler
    handle the case of encounter variable declaration line.
